Description: Clay tablet; complete; administrative; mu-tum; "namhartu", silver and animal offerings to the Shamash temple in Sippar-amnanum; seals; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.238)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
